item.title: Charlie Rose interview with Jeff Bezos
item.description: This is a fantastic interview of Jeff Bezos on Charlie Rose where Bezos talks about why Kindle shouldn't be the iPad and why Amazon's new mission is "Earth's most customer-centric company." http://www.charlierose.com/view/interview/11138
